item.title: Warner Bros Set to Reject Paramount’s $108.4B Hostile Bid Despite Larry Ellison’s Guarantee: Report
item.description: The board is expected to meet next week to review the amended offer.

item.title: Fed Minutes Signal Potential For More Easing As Officials Debate Risks To Inflation And Jobs
item.description: The minutes highlight a cautious Fed weighing whether slowing inflation will allow further rate cuts without risking economic stability.

item.title: Nvidia Reportedly In Talks For Up To $3B AI21 Acquisition As AI Deal Rush Intensifies
item.description: The talks underscore Nvidia’s effort to deepen its AI platform as competition for talent and scale intensifies.
